clumpy.density_estimation.Parameters¶

class clumpy.density_estimation.Parameters(method='gkde', **params)[source]¶

Bases: object

Density Estimators Parameters. Note that boundary parameters and forbid_null_value are set automatically when the density estimator is called by a model class.

Parameters

  • method ({'gkde'} or DensityEstimator) –

    The density estimator method or a callable class. For now, only the GKDE method is avaiable.

    gkde : Gaussian Kernel Density Estimator.

  • **params (kwargs) – Density estimator parameters.

Previous topic

clumpy.density_estimation.GKDE

Next topic

clumpy.model.parameters.Transitions
